pullrequest.title: Performance: Delete / insert models as we need them in view

content.raw:
wow!  That world update works great.  The factor is up to 0.38 with walking on the launch pad and Val responds very well.
I wonder why it made such a difference (0.13 to 0.38) on my machine compared to yours (0.23 to 0.31)?
WIth this, I think you are right that task 2 will now be the slowest.
content.html: wow! That world update works great. The factor is up to 0.38 with walking on the launch pad and Val responds very well. I wonder why it made such a difference (0.13 to 0.38) on my machine compared to yours (0.23 to 0.31)? WIth this, I think you are right that task 2 will now be the slowest.
